description: Unified manufacturing interfaces across 30+ sites with 90% unique machine types
longDescription:
# The Challenge

Electrolux operates 30+ manufacturing sites globally, each with unique machine configurations. The existing systems were fragmented, leading to high training costs and operational inefficiencies.

# The Solution

We created a comprehensive design system that balances standardization with necessary customization. The system includes:

- Modular UI components that adapt to different machine types
- A unified navigation pattern across all sites
- Accessibility features for factory floor environments
- Multi-language support with contextual help

# The Impact

The new system reduced training time by 40% and improved operational efficiency across all sites.
impact: Cost savings and successful adoption across diverse production environments

description: Self-sovereign identity platform for enterprise authentication and access control
longDescription:
# The Challenge

Enterprises need to adopt decentralized identity without disrupting existing IT infrastructure and workflows.

# The Solution

A hybrid identity wallet that bridges Web2 and Web3 authentication, allowing gradual migration to self-sovereign identity.

# The Impact

Deployed across 15 enterprise customers, managing 50,000+ digital credentials.
impact: Enabled enterprise adoption of self-sovereign identity with zero downtime

description: Blockchain-based product passports for circular economy compliance
longDescription:
# The Challenge

Manufacturers need to comply with upcoming EU Digital Product Passport regulations while maintaining supply chain confidentiality.

# The Solution

A privacy-preserving transparency platform using selective disclosure and zero-knowledge proofs.

# The Impact

Piloted with 5 major brands, tracking 10,000+ products from source to consumer.
impact: First-to-market DPP solution with privacy-by-design architecture
